value: LEVEL 9 115 PITT STREET, SYDNEY, 2000, NSW, Australia

8741 - Management Services Summary > GLOBAL X (AUS) PTY LTD is an Australian proprietary company. Its operations cover management services. The company is not involved in the import or export of goods. GLOBAL X (AUS) PTY LTD is headquartered in Sydney, New South Wales. It is headed by director Evan Metcalf. For the 2024 financial year, the company reported revenue of $32.40 million. Its net loss totalled $3.20 million. GLOBAL X (AUS) PTY LTD forms part of the services industry sector.
